name: Limbus Company: Season 4 - Clear All Cathy
summary:
Season 4: Clear All Cathy is the fourth Season of Limbus Company.

It consists of the game's sixth main Story Chapter (Canto VI: The Heartbreaking), centered on Heathcliff from the literary source Wuthering Heights, the fourth Mirror Dungeon, dubbed Mirror of the Wuthering, and Line 4 of Refraction Railway, alongside two side story chapters.
